alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 4:32PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. Johns, north central Putnam, northeastern Clay and southeastern Duval Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 431 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lakeside to 7 miles north of George`s Lake to near Florahome. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Ponte Vedra Beach, World Golf Village, Saint Augustine Beach, Baymeadows and Nocatee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. For boaters on or near the St Johns River or Intracoastal waterway, move to a safe shelter now! Do not be caught on or near the water. Gusty winds and choppy waves are likely. Make sure all on board are wearing life jackets.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Putnam
